help.message:
IceBreaker Bot Help:

/start - Start or restart the bot
/help - Show this help message
/suggest - Suggest a question to add

Follow the prompts to authenticate, select a profile, choose categories, and start the IceBreaker game.

authentication.welcome:
Welcome to the 🧊Ice Breaker🧊! 👋

Please enter your secret phrase to authenticate, or click to button below to create an account.
authentication.invalid_secret_phrase: Your secret phrase is invalid. Please re-check it and try again.
authentication.success:
Authentication successful!

Hello, {name}.

Ready to start the game?

signup.invalid_email:
Email {email} is invalid.
Please try again!
signup.user_exists: It seems that you already have an account. Please click /start and use your secret phrase to login.
signup.name_empty: Please don't leave your name empty!
signup.email_empty: Please don't leave your email empty!

selection.invalid: Invalid profile selection. Please try again.

creation.prompt: Please enter a name for your new profile:
creation.invalid: Please enter a valid profile name.
creation.length_error: Profile name must be between 1 and 50 characters. Please try again:
creation.success:
Profile "{profileName}" created successfully!

Now, please select categories (you can select multiple):
creation.error: Error creating profile: {message}. Please try again.

selection.prompt: Great! Now, please select categories (you can select multiple):
selection.invalid: Invalid category selection. Please try again.
selection.select_at_least_one: Please select at least one category before proceeding.

card.all_viewed:
‚ö†Ô∏è You have viewed all cards in these categories. ‚ö†Ô∏è

Please choose another category or change your filters!
card.no_cards: No cards found for the selected categories. Try selecting different categories.
card.error: Error retrieving card: {message}. Please try again.

suggestion.prompt: Thank you for suggesting a new question! Please write it in a message.
suggestion.unauthorized: You need to log in before you can suggest a question!
suggestion.success: Thank you for your suggestion! I'll let you know when the question is added.
